description: Details to accommodate the location of the existing London Underground structures and tunnels; provide assessment of ground movement impact on London Underground structures and tunnels due to temporary and permanent changes in loading associated with the proposed demolition/modification/construction works; provide details on what impact the proposed load path and construction activities will have on LUL assets; provide detailed design and Risk Assessment Method Statement (RAMS) for foundations, basement and ground floor structures, or for any other structures below ground level, including piling (temporary and permanent); provide detailed design and Risk Assessment Method Statement for all demolition, temporary and permanent works; plant/scaffolding/lifting equipment; provide detailed design and Risk Assessment Method Statement on the use of tall; and mitigate the effects of noise and vibration arising from the adjoining railway operations pursuant to Condition 14 of planning permission dated 27 March 2024 (RN23/08783/FULL)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
